lines.text: And *you*, you imposter, I'll have your memory pulled so fast you'll never forget it!
How do you apologize to someone for killing them?
When I perfected the "Thalamic Transplant" technique, these 'clickers' knew about it in a day and a half.

[to Acto]
But if you robots had the process, why did you risk using Raven? Why didn't you just do it yourself?

[turning to address camera]
Of course the operation was a success... or *you* wouldn't be here.
Mankind is a state of mind. Man is no more or less than he thinks himself to be.
Pax, you're wonderful. He's so glib, I'll bet he even has a sense of humor.
He'd *better* have! I paid extra for it. Say something funny, Pax.
Don't put me on, dear. I have a sense of humor, but I'm not creative.
